mapper.select: select id, product_code, logo, code, name, status, is_delete, created_by, updated_by, created_time, updated_time from o2o_support_idaas.app_tenant_info where id = #{id}
select id, product_code, logo, code, name, status, is_delete, created_by, updated_by, created_time, updated_time from o2o_support_idaas.app_tenant_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into o2o_support_idaas.app_tenant_info(product_code, logo, code, name, status, is_delete, created_by, updated_by, created_time, updated_time) values (#{productCode}, #{logo}, #{code}, #{name}, #{status}, #{isDelete}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime})

insert into o2o_support_idaas.app_tenant_info(product_code, logo, code, name, status, is_delete, created_by, updated_by, created_time, updated_time) values
(#{entity.productCode}, #{entity.logo}, #{entity.code}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.updatedBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updatedTime})

insert into o2o_support_idaas.app_tenant_info(product_code, logo, code, name, status, is_delete, created_by, updated_by, created_time, updated_time) values
(#{entity.productCode}, #{entity.logo}, #{entity.code}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.isDelete}, #{entity.createdBy}, #{entity.updatedBy}, #{entity.createdTime}, #{entity.updatedTime})
on duplicate key update product_code = values(product_code) , logo = values(logo) , code = values(code) , name = values(name) , status = values(status) , is_delete = values(is_delete) , created_by = values(created_by) , updated_by = values(updated_by) , created_time = values(created_time) , updated_time = values(updated_time)
mapper.update:
update o2o_support_idaas.app_tenant_info
product_code = #{productCode},
logo = #{logo},
code = #{code},
name = #{name},
status = #{status},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
created_by = #{createdBy},
updated_by = #{updatedBy},
created_time = #{createdTime},
updated_time = #{updatedTime},
where id = #{id}
